channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: Stevie Smith challenges Boy in the mini-golf tournament. However, as they practice, they actually become fast friends and neglect their training to hang out! channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: During their quest to stop Balthazar the Fabulous from sucking every last sunbeam out of the sky, the heroes realise there is something wrong with Hoofius, who keeps tripping up and has totally lost his confidence. Herbert explains that Hoofius has lost his mojo! To help their friend and complete the quest, the heroes take Hoofius up Mojo Mountain to help him get his mojo back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are excited to visit Whizzpop?s Pop-Up Bakery and taste his magical cakes, but they are shocked to find that the protein bars have shouty raisins in them, the custard tarts are rock hard, and the floating sponges keep floating away! Trevor quests to solve the mystery, but having accidentally fallen into Whizzpop?s invisibility flour, how on earth will he get everyone?s attention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: Blink hacks Sofia?s graffiti project, but Mansour paints the mystery artist into a corner.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Mansour: Age of AI
channel.desc: Blink takes control of Mansour's body using nanobots during his school music recital.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Drama
channel.desc: After an all-bean breakfast, the teams must cross the island in silence to avoid being eaten by raptors. The first team to reach the other side claims victory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets of the Scroll
channel.desc: Fate brings five animals and their unique kung fu styles together to make the perfect team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Renovations force Bitzer to camp out for the night. When the flock are shut out of the barn, they must also pitch up in the field. The sheep are loving their trendy glampsite at first, but as the weather worsens and batteries run low, the appeal of Bitzer?s practical tent grows.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When all the other danger agents become supersmart due to a batch of genetically enhanced celery, Danger Mouse might need to find a new job.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The kids of Beanotown decide that they can run the town far better than the grown-ups. However, they discover it isn?t nearly as easy or fun as they had hoped.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy is afraid of being honest in case he hurts other people's feelings and finds himself doing things he doesn?t like just to keep others happy. Mouse and Cheese encourage him to be totally honest, only to find that Boy?s total honesty can be rather blunt. Can the gang rein him in before Boy alienates the entire town.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: After breaking a carriage belonging to his beloved Princess, a besotted Prince orders another one from the Ninjas - but the Princess only has eyes for the Ninja Van.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. Oona meets Dr O's replacement.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Stinkweasel drops a rain of yukkiness onto the forest, the Fairy Squad, with their excellent flying skills, decide they are the ones for the job. However, Hoofius insists this should be their quest, even if he does hate ick! And when the Fairy Squad get their wings gunked and are unable to fly, the heroes can resume their quest to end Stinkweasel?s reign of stinky nonsense - no flying required.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face a revolutionary enemy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Retrieving data. Wait a few seconds and try to cut or copy again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Ahead of the Women?s Euros, we visit St George?s Park, the home of England?s national teams, to meet some future stars of the game! Welsh footballer Ella Powell and Euros champion Ella Toone answer your questions, and Joel and Abby go head-to-head in a goalball challenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: Dragons, dinos and divas! The Kwapongs craft fire-breathers, Romesh Ranganathan draws a rapping T-rex, and Bristles dives into the bold, brilliant world of Frida Kahlo.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: 4 O'Clock Club
channel.desc: Polly?s perfect day with Evan suddenly goes horribly wrong. Meanwhile, Eli thinks Owen has a secret girlfriend? but gets a shock when he learns who Owen is really hanging out with.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: April Fool?s day at the leisure centre can only mean one thing - more pranks than normal! Sharon tries to ban them, but there is a mystery pranker whose identity not even Danny knows. Meanwhile, Mick has his own idea of what an April fool is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: It is the annual sports day competition at Pottsfield and this time around it's Danny v Lance. They compete in a selection of events, including the classic sport of who can put on the most clothes and who can pop the balloon fastest with their bum.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: The bros are back with a splash, kicking off with a blockbuster challenge and ThatsWatson. And it?s time to race around the ultimate obstacle course - on water.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The brothers visit Belgium?s Pairi Daiza Zoo to meet pandas, walruses, penguins and the golden takin, all animals that have adapted to survive in the coldest climates.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall finds himself quite literally in deep water as he goes in search of underwater animals for his Deadly 60 list. The idyllic waters off the coast of Borneo hide a wealth of lethal predators, but just who is worthy of a place on the list? Camouflage, stealth and serious weaponry are the order of the day as Steve comes face to face with a highly venomous scorpion fish and witnesses the formidable spear mantis impaling its supper with its retractable spear-like arms. Just when Steve thinks he has seen it all, he finds himself surrounded by a gigantic shoal of barracuda in one of the most awesome animal encounters of the series.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: The action shifts to Steve's home turf as the Deadly 60 team scour the UK in search of its lethal beauties. From the wild seas off the Pembrokeshire coast to the New Forest, Steve proves that British wildlife is anything but boring. Gannets prove to be more than a match for Steve in a diving competition. He battles with the elements to reach the birds but the rough seas are determined to stop him. He then has to confront his past as he comes face to face with the only venomous snake that has hospitalised him. The Deadly team also have a close call as they uncover a hornets' nest in a loft, and Steve gets a taste of what it is like to be prey for a day as he is hunted through a forest by a hungry goshawk.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Xand tries to sleep standing up, then finds out how virtual reality can help in surgery. Doctors Chris and Xand count down five things that make the skin crawl.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: The Ug and Ugio families go head to head on Stone Age Family Fortunes, mad King George III's doctors are even madder than he is and Emperor Elagabalus launches his pranktastic Roman lottery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Joan of Arc gets a visit from a confused angel, a pirate captain tries to make his crew dress like ladies, and Mrs Celt enjoys being a Roman on Historical Wife Swap.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Viper with a fake interview that ends with an unexpected splashdown, but he doesn?t find it funny! The other Gladiators have sneaky behind-the-scenes fun at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. In trying to prove he does not believe in magic, Danger Mouse accidentally unleashes an evil magical queen into the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: When Jeopardy Mouse wins the Agent of the Month competition, Danger Mouse and Penfold are forced to travel to New York for a lesson and to take on the criminal organisation known as Hydrant.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Penfold's addiction to social media helps the Baron turn all of Danger Mouse's secrets against him in a plot to deflate the planet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Miss Mistry and Mrs Creecher clash over the best way to teach Class 3C about butterflies. The gang just want to get through the lesson so they can get out of school in time for a Grizzly Griller Wildlife Event.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Paul the Potato is love-struck by the poster girl potato advertising WilburCorp?s new line of super-posh chips. The gang stage a daring potato rescue in the WilburCorp factory.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Olive surprises herself and everyone around her by actually becoming a good cook, Dr Pfooflepfeffer tries to cash in by turning the school canteen into an exclusive and super-expensive dining experience.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Blossom is terrible at keeping secrets, and Trevor can?t help but point that out. To prove him wrong, Blossom refuses to reveal the secret hiding place for her piece of the Amulet of Protection, even though the heroes need it to stop Balthazar casting a weather spell on the forest. With a rain of crabs heading their way, the heroes must quickly persuade Blossom to reveal her secret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Gnome Crystal Mine has ground to a halt, leaving the forest with no crystals, no power supply and melting ice lollies! The heroes are tasked with a quest to find out what has happened and to fix it. It turns out that a slimy beast named Smarg has made the mine her home. But with Hoofius?s fear of gunk getting the better of him, evicting the slippery Smarg is not going to be easy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is acting very strangely indeed. He refuses to stamp any of Admin Bunny?s documents, keeps getting distracted by butterflies, and seems oddly happy! The heroes are extremely suspicious and decide that someone must have swapped him with a doppelganger. Now they must quest to find out where the real Friendlyface is and get him back before the forest descends into total chaos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy moves into a greenhouse - but the Lemmings are coming too.

channel.desc: The Lemmings build a giant ice slide in the cabin. However, Grizzy makes sure the fun doesn't last long.

channel.desc: The Lemmings dream up a scheme where Grizzy would submit to their will.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.desc: Darrell?s final year starts with a fierce argument with Gwen, but she knows they need to work together. Meanwhile, French student Celeste joins the Third and plays a prank on the teachers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Addie has a meltdown on a school trip and finds a strange witch jar. It?s the start of a life-changing adventure full of friendship, frenemies and a mystery that must be solved.

channel.desc: A-Troupe?s latest victory is cut short after an Absolute Dance rules change shakes things up. Now, winning regionals isn?t just about their reputation. It's also about saving the studio.

channel.desc: A-Troupe tries to stay focused on regionals as Heath and Pete learn more about the Brawl. Anthony helps Adele with an audition, while Ariana feels overworked.

The four kids she is guided towards are unlikely heroes, but when they are thrown into danger, their hidden strengths surprise everyone.

channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings end up lost after misplacing their jar of Yummy in a labyrinth.

channel.desc: The Farmer tasks Bitzer with baling up a fresh haystack, but the hungry sheep have hidden inside and are turned into moving bales. A wild game of chase the bale results as Bitzer tries to restore order to the hay field.

channel.desc: Dog finds out he has fleas! But when he befriends them, he must hide them from his family to prevent them from getting zapped.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a polar bear and realises they are from the same species.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree that casts maledictions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Ms O leaves headquarters in the hands of an unlikely crew. Curriculum: Spatial Sense: Mapping, Position, Location and Direction.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Twinkle feels she is being taken for granted by the other heroes, so she joins the Fairy Squad when they arrive.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve demonstrates how reading the tracks and signs left by an animal can lead to fantastic encounters. Lions, octopuses and badgers all feature in this special as Steve and his trusty crew travel the planet reading the signs they leave behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Cooking Buddies
channel.desc: Kicking off the series in Buddy?s den, the gloves are on as Buddy and Conker are joined by Jackson, a young boxer who wants to learn a recipe that can pack a punch to keep his energy up! Buddy knows that Jackson loves a big-stacked sandwich, so what better than a homemade fish finger sandwich topped with crunchy lettuce and a simple two-ingredient delicious sauce, all packed into a soft bun?! Learning to cook means that you can make your meals exactly how you like them, so Jackson chooses to use cod and Buddy uses salmon, and things get messy when they breadcrumb the fish! Taking time out from the kitchen, Buddy is kept on his toes by Jackson as he gives him a lesson in boxing. Buddy learns to be light on his feet, throw a punch and read his opponent? Join Buddy, Conker and Jackson in this tasty episode of Cooking Buddies that certainly packs a punch! You can get all of Buddy?s recipes, and LOADS more, at bbc.co.uk\/food.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ricky Wilson's Art Jam
channel.desc: TV presenter and DJ Kem Cetinay visits the Art Jam studio to show Ricky three items that mean the world to him - his first pair of hairdressing scissors, his dog Rocky?s collar and his grandfather?s shepherd whistle. While chatting to Ricky, Kem shares amazing stories about how learning to be a hairdresser boosted his confidence, how his dog Rocky has helped improve his mental health, his incredible family history and the fun he has as a TV presenter.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: How does the body know when it needs to wee? The doctors find out in the lab! An optical illusion turns Dr Xand?s face green in Mindbenders, and it's time to check in on the Ouchers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: We meet small-for-his-age Gavers, who has always had a tough battle against much bigger kids his own age, and four academy players watch the first team play.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: Witness crazy, record-breaking collections, and discover the tallest giraffe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Nine Minute Ninja
channel.desc: Ricky gets into the groove making a Dance Decision Maker and demonstrates how to draw a trainer. Street dance brings a giant painted robot to life.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A prank-loving emperor hosts a dinner party on Roman Come Dine with Me, the Durham Home Guard injure themselves while learning first aid, and a Viking rock band paint the town red... literally.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Duncan from Glasgow is passionate about protecting orangutans and wants to raise awareness of their plight within his local community. He wants a den where he can hang out, learn more about his favourite primates and how to help them, and share his passion with friends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Big Manny joins for an icy challenge, and it?s time to jump in with both feet as Callum sets Adam and Joe an extreme puzzle challenge 15,000 feet in the air.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: When the Go Jetters find the Grimbots shipping overripe tomatoes into the Spanish town of Bunol, they put a stop to whatever Glitch is up to - until they find out that the tomatoes were destined for the famous Tomatina Festival, the biggest food fight in the world. Can the Go Jetters fix their own 'glitch' and save the festival.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: A dragonfly steals a bee cocoon that Cosima had vowed to keep safe. Cosima and Big Lizard give chase, leading to a surprising solution with a vacuum cleaner and some sticky vines.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: Octo-Agent Min discovers a decimated bamboo forest ? a habitat crucial to pandas.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: The Piris take refuge in grumpy Millie the Squid?s cave during a storm but accidentally damage a painting. Can they find a clever way to fix it before Millie finds out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Evil Pea pretends to help Supertato and Carrot train for crime prevention, but she tricks them and steals a mobile phone. Supertato and Carrot have a clever plan to get it back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Colonel K disappears on a free holiday, Danger Mouse pulls rank and assumes the mantle of caretaker colonel. However, the role is much less exciting than he anticipated, as world-saving missions make way for endless paperwork. Meanwhile, K's freebie spa retreat happens to be a diversion tactic in Greenback's latest plot to take over the world, with the baron banking on the Danger Agency falling apart without its figurehead and the world descending into disarray.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Convinced that Mrs Creecher is secretly a master of Blamjitsu, JJ persuades the gang to help trick her into revealing her blam credentials.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Doctor Pfooflepfeffer covets the world-beating power of Gnasher?s indestructible teeth and will stop at nothing to get her hands on one of those doggy dental marvels.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is particularly tetchy this morning. He is packing for a skiing trip, but a dragon has pinched his golden fleece, and he urgently needs the heroes to quest it back ? how else will he stay warm and cosy on the slopes? However, when the heroes accidentally agree to let his niece Trixie tag along with them, they fear that her clumsiness and lack of hero skills will ruin everything.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: In order to crown a new king, Merlin summons the Ninjas to pull the legendary sword from the stone. After a few tries, they realize the solution is right under their noses.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: From camels to space rockets, via Dandy Horses, actual horses, royal train rides, cars, balloons and planes, it's the Horrible History of travel.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: After learning the story of the Ancient Adventurer, Liko is faced with a decision.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: From Cleopatra?s hairdo to Elizabeth I?s flushing loo, meet history?s biggest Influencers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Olive surprises herself and everyone around her by actually becoming a good cook, Dr Pfooflepfeffer tries to cash in by turning the school canteen into an exclusive and super-expensive dining experience.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's over-reliance on gadgets prompts Colonel K to send his top agent on a tech-free nature retreat. Unbeknownst to Danger Mouse, Greenback has the same plans for his daughter, Delilah, whose social media obsession has also spiralled out of control. Back at HQ Penfold is tasked with protecting the entire world from the threat of super-villainy. Stripped off his gadgets, DM struggles to adapt to life in the wilderness and, when a talking pine cone called Conni begins to offer him survival tips, he begins to question his own sanity. Soon enough, Delilah catches wind of DM's presence and she plots to destroy him as a means of getting back into her Dad's good books.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Yin and Yang are missing one brick to finish the Great Wall of China. With the minister quickly approaching to see the completed wall, Yang orders a brick from the Ninjas.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Despite warnings, the sheep have gobbled up the birthday cake Bitzer has baked for the Farmer. Realising the kitchen cupboards are bare, Shaun and the flock must try and source ingredients for a new one from around the farm before Bitzer realises. The result is certainly a surprise.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a futuristic underground site.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mouse's latest experiment goes horribly wrong when he swaps brains with a house fly! With his sibling?s help, Mouse frantically tries reversing the wacky situation.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The Witch, who was trapped in a Merhaven clam shell while pinching a pearl, grants Blossom a single wish to thank her for releasing her and saving her life. Blossom excitedly chooses a mermaid?s tail to improve her swimming. However, when the Merqueen complains that her pearl is missing, and the heroes have to quest to get it back, Blossom soon realises how tricky a mermaid?s tail can become on land.

channel.desc: Joel takes on his scariest challenge yet as he camps in a tent overnight 500ft in the sky! And to get there he must climb and navigate his way through the slate mines of Honister Pass.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Realising that Bitzer has a series of whistles which can control the flock?s movements, Shaun steals them and soon has the flock dancing to his tune. When the Farmer finds the whistles stuck together like a harmonica, his dreadful playing gives Shaun a taste of his own medicine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Danger Mouse makes short work of Burt Badboy and his newly acquired band of fanatical feline followers, the group's leader Mandy and her cult of cats immediately trade in their colourful mohican hairstyles for eyepatches and become Danger Mouse worshippers. At first Danger Mouse is having too much fun to take notice of Penfold's warnings about his new-found cult status, but even he is forced to act when the cats follow his example a little too literally and live life a little too dangerously. Danger Mouse's attempt to disown the cats goes down like a lead balloon, and they use mouse-fu skills and a superpowered amulet stolen from Tutenkamoo to show their idol the error of his ways. Danger Mouse battles the frenzied feline onslaught and saves HQ from becoming a giant scratching post. However, this only reaffirms the idea that he is the chosen one in the minds of Mandy and the cult of cats. Danger Mouse realises that the only solution is to find a new obsession for the cats.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and the gang take on the power of WilburCorp to stop Walter?s new line of collectable toys ruining the Beanotown environment with all its wasteful plastic packaging.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: To celebrate Christmas, Mum and Dad suggest that the siblings make each other gifts.?When Dog is assigned to give a gift to Cheese, she sneaks to find out what the gift is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a futuristic underground site.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The agents try and stop baby Agent Orson from getting kicked off the squad. Curriculum: Using bar graphs, pie charts and Venn diagrams to sort, classify and analyse data.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The tired heroes must quest to find out and stop whatever is making the loud wailing noise that has kept the residents of the forest up all night.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve and the team are at the Museum of Natural History in Oxford. Steve takes a look inside some of the top predators featured on Deadly 60 to find out what makes them so deadly. The skeletons and jaws of crocodiles, snakes and some of the most lethal sharks on the planet hold the key as to their deadly prowess.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Cooking Buddies
channel.desc: Buddy Oliver and his dog, Conker, invite Aiyla to join them in their kitchen den to cook up some tasty food and share some of the skills and hobbies that they both love! A black belt in karate, Aiyla loves food that has a kick, so Buddy shows her how to make her very own homemade pasta, tossed with a spicy tomato sauce ? all made from scratch with fresh ingredients in super simple steps. It will be the perfect meal before her karate competitions! In return, Aiyla teaches Buddy some of the skills needed for karate; from balance to breathing to having power in his moves, before bringing it all together. Join Buddy, Conker and Aiyla in this super tasty episode to learn how to chop in the kitchen AND in the dojo! You can get all of Buddy?s recipes, and LOADS more, at bbc.co.uk\/food.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ricky Wilson's Art Jam
channel.desc: Fifteen-year-old TV presenter, vlogger and motivational speaker Tilly Lockey visits the Art Jam studio to show Ricky three items that mean the world to her - her hi-tech bionic arm, a special trinket box and some amazing fan art. While chatting to Ricky, Tilly shares amazing stories about the design of her bionics, her love of spreading positivity, the busy house she shares with 11 pets and giving motivational speeches alongside people such as Dalai Lama.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Xand arm wrestles the world?s strongest woman to help find out how muscles grow. And the doctors reveal the top five bizarre things your body can do.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: In this episode, the focus is on U13s goalie Keanu, who is in remission from leukaemia and back to his best. We also meet 14-year-old midfield dynamo Libby.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: It's time for some spectacular sponging and box-office body rolling.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Nine Minute Ninja
channel.desc: It's time for Ricky to spin around the world. Inspired by artist Tom Purvis he creates an art deco travel poster, uses colour swatches to make an Egyptian mummy and art erupts when he shows us how to draw an exploding volcano.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A pirate captain regrets stealing a herd of seasick cows, a Georgian sportsman invents a whole new way of boxing, King Charles II raps about his party lifestyle, and the Georgian army goes to war against a bunch of naughty schoolboys.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Zoe from Oxfordshire is mad about science and dreams of becoming a scientist one day. She loves to carry out messy, noisy experiments, but her dad works night shifts, which means she has to be quiet while he sleeps. She desperately wants her own space where she can pursue her passions and make a mess whenever she wants.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Celebs Viggo Venn and Phil Green come to the aid of Adam and Joe as they try to prove to Callum who is the most talented. With impressions and dad dancing, what?s not to like.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Ubercorn, Glitch and the Go Jetters all head to the Dwarkadhish Temple in Dwarka, India, for the Holi Festival of Colour. This Hindu celebration involves people throwing a colourful powder called gulal all over one another. Glitch plans to bring a huge flag he and Ubercorn made as cadets for the top of the temple. But after he accidentally washes all the colour out of it, he orders his Grimbots to bring him gulal powder to dye it again. The Grimbots do this rather too well, however, and soon there is no more powder left for the festival! It's up to the Go Jetters to fix Glitch's mistake and save the celebration.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When Cosima wrongly accuses Big Lizard of eating Dad's birthday cake, he vanishes. Has he run away, or is he planning a special surprise to save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: Dashi survives a crash in the Octoray just as a hurricane nears the Florida Everglades.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Nugget annoys Pancake with constant demands while ill in bed. To say sorry, she makes him a special bracelet. But Nugget is upset when others get ?nuglets? too.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Evil Pea asks for flying lessons when Broccoli flies her paper plane into her freezer. Evil Pea doesn?t let Broccoli know that she intends to fly high to take over Tato Tower.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Envious at Danger Mouse's ever-growing medal collection, Penfold questions whether he will ever be deemed special enough to receive a prize of his own. Seconds later, a knock at the door reveals a holographic Quark, who anoints Penfold as 'the chosen one' in a suspiciously automated message that culminates in an overawed Penfold receiving his very own magic wand. Penfold's joy is short-lived however - as he and DM step outside of HQ to find that the streets of are London teeming with hundreds of wannabe wizards, all brandishing identical wands. After discovering that the wands are mass-produced shavings from Merlin's legendary staff, the pair set out to stop Quark's latest money-making scheme by reuniting the staff with its rightful owner.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Fed up with Dennis pulling the wool over Mrs Creecher's eyes, Walter orchestrates a robot to take over Class 3C - with disastrous results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis accidentally becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But his moment of fame is short and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter's cat, who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his audience.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Twinkle feels she is being taken for granted by the other heroes, so she joins the Fairy Squad when they arrive.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: With his crew on the verge of a mutiny, a pirate captain and his parrot order a treasure trove to placate them, leading the Ninjas on a trip to the Egyptian pyramids.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Ahead of the Women?s Euros, we visit St George?s Park, the home of England?s national teams, to meet some future stars of the game! Welsh footballer Ella Powell and Euros champion Ella Toone answer your questions, and Joel and Abby go head-to-head in a goalball challenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: While the Brave Olivine has its computer system rebooted, it?s picnic time for the crew.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Sketchy Comedy
channel.desc: Eggs, sausages, a freezer and toilet roll are among the items getting the Sketchy treatment.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: From Henry VIII?s wine fountain, to Empress Dowager?s marble boat, Horrible Histories talks money, jewellery and untold treasures.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Professor von Screwtop gets mistaken for the new kid in school and joins Class 3C for the day. Rubi is so embarrassed at her dad?s antics that she resorts to pranking to get him into trouble and out of the way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: The Snowman is hired as Danger Mouse's new sidekick, leaving Penfold without a job.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: After the battery dies on her laser shoe, special agent Gloria Hope calls on the Ninjas to help her find a new one and foil criminal mastermind Pam D'Terre.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: When the Farmer accidentally drills a hole in a waterpipe while putting up a new shelf, Bitzer frantically tries to stop the leak from soaking the living room and prevent the Farmer?s precious teapots from sliding off the shelf.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy is afraid of being honest in case he hurts other people's feelings and finds himself doing things he doesn?t like just to keep others happy. Mouse and Cheese encourage him to be totally honest, only to find that Boy?s total honesty can be rather blunt. Can the gang rein him in before Boy alienates the entire town.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are on a quest to find the vault containing the Amulet of Answers and protect it at all costs. But the Riddlemaster is back, and he manages to trap them in his castle, tricking Herbert into handing the Amulet of Answers over to him. Now he has all the answers to every question ever asked, and the heroes must find a way to outwit him - even though he knows what they are going to do next.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. When an unlucky coin is accidentally released into the public, the agents must retrieve it before the world ends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigates strange events. When a new room opens up in headquarters, all the agents want a piece.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Izzy wants to play a superhero game but has difficulty persuading her friends to join in.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Simplificator.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs bowl into space with DIY alien skittles, Emma Stothard weaves a wicker dog, and Kiell Smith-Bynoe draws a ghost so spooked, it?s nearly see-through.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Matron arrives with Nancy, her young ward, and Gwen tells her to ask Matron to stay, which annoys Matron. Nancy joins the third formers as they search for the missing time capsule.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: No longer dance captain, Anthony finds following orders difficult. Jett and Ariana try to be friends again, while Heath?s history with Daisy complicates things with Pascale.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Abby and Shini go head-to-head in a powerchair football challenge! Using specially designed powerchairs as part of four-a-side teams, who will come out on top.
